strongs_def: to breathe (voluntarily but gently, thus differing on the one hand from G4154 (ψύχω), which denotes properly a forcible respiration; and on the other from the base of G109 (ψύχω), which refers properly to an inanimate breeze), i.e. (by implication, of reduction of temperature by evaporation) to chill (figuratively)
outline:
1. to breathe, blow, cool by blowing
  2. to be made or grow cool or cold
  3. metaph. of waning love
